name: Tindertale (Undertale retextured)
description:
This is currently a DEMO not the full game. YOU MUST OWN A COPY OF UNDERTALE BEFORE INSTALLING! (This is still currently in developement)

Ruins - 95%

Snowdin - 35-40%

Waterfall - 15%

Hotland + core - 1%

General sprites - 33%

Bosses - 19%

I am trying to make quick progress so please hold on tight! have fun. (also for copyright reasons it is a mod not a fangame)
